titles: A dose for Chamberlain, and a pill for the doctor; being an answer to two scurrilous pamphlets, written against the author of the Asses complaint, &c.
author: Cook, William, fl. 1661.
notes: Verse: "VVhat ailes this bauling puppy thus to prate? ..."
In answer to Robert Chamberlain's Balaam's asse cudgeld; and Edmund Cooper's The asse beaten for bawling.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
keywords: Griffin, Lewis. --  Asses complaint against Balaam --  Early works to 1800.
Chamberlain, Robert, b. 1607. --  Balaam's asse cudgeld --  Early works to 1800.
Cooper, Edmund. --  Asse beaten for bawling --  Early works to 1800.
